changes.summary: Implemented 2 intelligence services (streak-guardian, deadline-radar) with 12 comprehensive tests
decisions_made: Streak Guardian: detects streaks at risk based on last_active_date. Severity escalates with streak length (>=7 days = urgent vs <7 days = attention)
Streak Guardian: mapCategoryToDomain helper provides simple name-to-LifeDomain mapping with personal_growth as default
Deadline Radar: monitors tasks (0-3 day window), projects (0-7 day window), and calendar events (30-minute warning)
Deadline Radar: severity levels — overdue=critical, due today=urgent, due tomorrow=attention, due in 3 days=info
Calendar events: only non-all-day events trigger 0-30 minute warnings, type='calendar_conflict'
All signals use uuid() for id generation, source field identifies service, auto_actionable=false (require user confirmation)
